trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a class converts property change events to <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 클래스가 속성 변경 이벤트를 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> 이벤트로 변환하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface is typically implemented together with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and indicates that the list converts property change events to <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> 인터페이스와 함께 일반적으로 구현 됩니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> 인터페이스 및 목록 변환 속성 변경 이벤트를 나타내며 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: You rarely need to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface.

However, for performance purposes, your data source should implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> if it provides the functionality described previously, and your data source is interacting with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component, because this functionality is built into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 성능 향상을 위해 데이터 원본에 구현 해야 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> 앞에서 설명한 기능을 제공 하 고 데이터 원본의 상호 작용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> 는 에이기능이내장되어있으므로구성요소<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> object raises <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> 개체가 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> 이벤트를 발생시키는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> object raises <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events when one of its property values changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값 중 하나가 변경될 때 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> 개체가 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> 이벤트를 발생시키면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
